name: Cometa, image processing service.
description: Super fast, on-demand and on-the-fly, image processing.

COMETA_CLUSTER.description: Run the application in a cluster.

COMETA_PORT.description: The port on which the application will listen.

COMETA_KEY.description: Your unique key used to sign requests. Change this to something hard to guess.

COMETA_ALLOW_UNAUTHORIZED.description: Allow unsigned requests. This should not be 'true'.

COMETA_REQUEST_TIMEOUT.description: Request timeout when trying to download images from URLs.
